statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-4 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x + 2 , 28 \, x^{3} - 30 \, x^{2} + 12 \, x + 16 , 32 \, x^{3} - 37 \, x^{2} + 30 \, x + 2 , -4 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} - 4 , -16 \, x^{3} + 18 \, x^{2} - 12 \, x - 4\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
